mapper.update: update book set status = 'N' where 1=1 and isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, ifnull(rr.status, 'Y') as 'rentYN' FROM book b left outer JOIN ( SELECT r.* FROM (SELECT isbn, status , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY isbn ORDER BY rentalno DESC) AS `rank` FROM rental) AS r WHERE r.rank = 1 ) AS rr ON b.isbn = rr.isbn WHERE b.isbn = #{isbn} and b.status = 'Y'

SELECT b.*, ifnull(rr.status, 'Y') as 'rentYN' FROM book b left outer JOIN ( SELECT r.* FROM (SELECT isbn, status , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY isbn ORDER BY rentalno DESC) AS `rank` FROM rental) AS r WHERE r.rank = 1 ) AS rr ON b.isbn = rr.isbn WHERE 1=1
and title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
and author = #{author}
and b.status = 'Y'
